MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the WA8 postcode area of Widnes, affecting properties in Foxley Heath, Coleridge Grove and surrounding streets. This is causing flickering and reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.29PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.45PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 6.54PM on 18th February 2021.
